page.title: 16OTTERY'S AMENITIES
page.content: Today Ottery has a population of approximately 7000. Many new detached semi_detached and link houses and bungalows have been built on the out_ skirts of the old town,and many of the old terraced cottages in the centre of the town have been modernised.The town is well supplied with food shops D.I.Y., electrical and clothes shops and gift shops, but many people shop outside the town in Exeter or at cash and carry markets. There are also branches of all the major Banks Building Societies and Estate Agents. There is no rail service and a poor bus service. Most people rely on private cars. There is a large modern health centre where five doctors hold surgeries from Monday to Friday on a rota system. The cottage hospital
